title: Ping Fluctuation
body: For over one year now I have put up with my ping slowly rising from the normal 37 to well over 800 and then go back down, only to once again go back up when it reaches 37. I've contacted Riot three times about this and only in the latest response I got a legitimate answer for my troubles. My internet is insufficient to play the game. Now I believe this to be complete bs because nothing about my internet or computer has changed since I started playing mid season two. Has anyone else experienced this problem and better yet, found a way to fix it. I left this game for seven months because of it and only recently came back to see if it would fix itself before contacting Riot again to get the previous response.

replies.body:
Taking a look into the ticket, I'm not certain what happened but I want to help you out.  I've reached out to my friend in tech to take a look at this for you, and would like to get some more details on your specific issue.  Your ISP may also be routing differently and causing delays in reaching us.  To find out for sure, download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to get an analysis of your routing to the game server, using 103.240.227.5 as the destination.  

Grab those files, and attach it to a new [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Request Rubik in your ticket, and he will be reaching out to you.  Let me know when you've submitted your ticket, and I'll poke him!
